about_the_game:
INTRODUCTION

A strange tale, weaved like the petals of a flower.

A fan-disc of the strange and eerie otherworldly BL fantasy "The Town of Nie".

This title is set about one year after the main story, and features epilogues for the lover partners, side stories told from the perspective of side characters, and episodes after the ending, which delves deeper into the characters and the world view.

STORY

*Opening（End 7 - After the Ending）

Our main character, Hisora, spent his days working his blue-collar jobs every day without a moment to rest. One day, he followed a man in mourning clothes and ended up getting lost in an eerie world.

It has been about one year of Hisora searching for a way back home while staying at the Inn - the season is now summer.

While he still has not found a way back to the real world, Hisora has come to enjoy his life together with the residents of the Inn.

In the midst of these extraordinary days, an eerie shadow begins to haunt him.

Not wanting to burden anyone, Hisora does not share this with the others, and begins to live in anxiety...

This is a tale of bright, hot summer days.

CHARACTER

The main character of this story. A simple and honest young man.

One day, he suddenly finds himself lost in a strange world with a classic Japanese feel to it. He lives in room 204 of an Inn filled with unique residents, while searching for a way to return to his own world.

Due to having wandered into this world with his flesh and blood body, his "living" smell attracts the dark ones who live in this world.

The resident of room 301.

He always has a goofy smile on his face, but his communication skills are unrivaled, and he has many acquaintances.

He loves drinking, smoking, and large breasts, and holds drinking parties every night at the Inn.

Although he can be childish and lazy, he can also be very dependable at times.

The resident of room 304.

He always seems listless, but he also acts and speaks intimidatingly and bluntly. Though he has an overbearing attitude and settles things he doesn't like with his metal bat, he also has a clean and refined side to him.

Previously, he viewed Hisora as an irregular presence, and as an enemy, but...

The resident of room 207.

Essentially a well-behaved and polite person, he is the epitome of good manners.

Everyone tends to call him "Hisora's dog."

He cares for Hisora to the extent that he's quick to get into a fight over him.

A kendo master, he will not hesitate to use his trusty crowbar to knock down anyone who tries to harm Hisora.

The resident of room 306.

A sweet-looking playboy who takes care of all the housework at the Inn.

He's like a mother to the Inn inhabitants, and like a pop star to the people of the town.

Usually playful and calm, but it's rumored that he can be very scary if he gets angry.

STAFF

Original Concept：Inu Denkyu

Scenario Writer：Banya Izumi

illustration： Miki Rinno

Original：√ZOMBILiCA

Publisher：dramatic create（HuneX）

CAST

Hisora Kiyozumi：Tetsu Watake

Mio Suou：Netoru Irakusa

Asuku Rokusho：Tasuke Rokujo

Naruomi Kuchiba：Souji Sarutobi

Koko：Wasshoitaro

and others

*The content of the Steam version is the same as the Nintendo Switch "The Town of Nie Iromusubi" Rating CERO-D(For ages 17 and up).

name: The Town of Nie Iromusubi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: The 2st generation Intel® Core™ processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2500/4000 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "The Town of Nie Iromusubi", a fan-disc of the strange and eerie otherworldly BL fantasy "The Town of Nie." Weaving together extraordinary colors.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
